TopicTitle: Spacemen - Short Sci-Fi stories by me.

Articles.Content:
Oi peeps, im starting a new series of short stories called Spacemen, short Sci-Fi stories by me. Wich is bassicly random stories about space in the Iconel/Ameschland universe (if you dont know my universes, check this out:
